website_summaries.verdict: A quality reel for a decent price.
pros: Solid construction with brass gears and carbon fiber drag washers
Components offer superior corrosion resistance, even in saltwater
cons: Some buyers experienced the drag breaking

customer_reviews.title: Great Reel Features for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Nice reel for the price. Very well built and cast wells. I use this reel to go catfishing in the local canals and rivers. Wish they would offer a power handle on this model like they do on the larger versions of this same reel line. These reels come with clickers for guys who bait fish. Just push the thumb release and turn on the clicker. When you hear the clicker indicating that a fish is on just turn the handle to engage the reel.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony G.

customer_reviews.title: My go-to big bait reel
customer_reviews.text: I have recently got into swimbait fishing for big bass and pike. These baits are anywhere from 1.5-4 ounces so I needed a reel that could handle the stress of throwing large baits over and over. I made a great decision getting this Chaos. Oversized gearing and slow gear ratio makes chucking and winding big baits a breeze all day long. Also been a great reel to use for catfish and dead baits!
customer_reviews.author: Mohr

customer_reviews.title: ... this new reel from Piscifun and have been completely amazed at the quality of components that are used
customer_reviews.text: Recently received this new reel from Piscifun and have been completely amazed at the quality of components that are used. Silky smooth and definitely is built to last! Decided to switch all my trolling reels over to these and will not be looking back! Definitely do yourself a favor and get one but be prepared to be wanting more! Very nicely done Piscifun!!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Gamerdinger

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST CIRCLE REEL I'VE EVER SEEN!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Talks about a tough reel! This is the sturdiest reel I've ever touched. I can cast a 2oz Hud like a beetle spin! I got the size 40 and I love it. Yesterday I in the yard casting a dog bumper and reeling in my 55lb Mountain Cur! If you are wanting this reel for big swim baits or other big game fish I would recommend this reel!
customer_reviews.author: brody jacks

customer_reviews.title: Quality reel and looks great and works awesome
customer_reviews.text: Reel is built very well. Retrieve is very smooth and clicker is loud. I will be using this reel for Kokanee fishing and have it paired up to a blue rod with blue mono and it looks really sharp. If the drag works as well as the reel looks, it will be one of my favorites. Excellent value. UPDATE: Paired it with a Blue Velocity rod for Kokanee and it not only looks great, it worked flawlessly. Caught at least 10 kokanee and a 24 inch Lake trout on it and it performed without a hiccup. Drag is smooth and like the micro adjustments for line release. Excellent reel and will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: mmaxym

customer_reviews.title: You have to adjust the 2 knobs to center the spool! It’s easy to do and makes it perfect.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast. I have landed several 20lb+ yellow taill. I figured for the price what the heck, to my suprise this reel was able to handle one of the hardest fighting fish we have here in Southern California. The drag on this thing is smooth and consistent, honestly I can’t beleive mine still works I got 5 yellows on it and each one was pulling drag till the end. Super versatile, I have fished live bait on a deopper, thrown surface irons and even trolled with it. Trust me I tried to break this thing, highly recommend this reel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke the 2nd time out
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to give this a good review after the first time using it. It seemed like a solid and smooth reel. I used the pascifun braided line with it. I could look passed the "clicking" tension knob that barely lets you know it's clicking with the moving numbered guide behind it. But the thumb bar locked up, then bent (internally) leaving the casting and retrieve toggle unusable. It looks like where the thumb bar fits into is broken or stripped, so I'm not sure if even trying to bend it back would work. But I shouldn't even have to be trying to fix this anyway.
customer_reviews.author: coletrain

customer_reviews.title: Awesome reel at a super price
customer_reviews.text: I have to say i absolutely love this new reel. I fish with abu garcia 6500 and 7000 religiously for 15 years i didnt think there was another reel out there that could hang with them. I bought one piscifun chaos 60 last week and i am impressed it will out cast my abu's with ease. The drag is super smooth and strong over the weekend i caught a 42lb blue catfish on the missouri river and the reel worked flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: billy

customer_reviews.title: great product both were in pretty fast smooth except one ...
customer_reviews.text: great product both were in pretty fast smooth except one of them kinda has a click noise when you wind it. hopeing to replace it in a hurry because I gave it to my brother for his bday. but it makes a noise when you bring in the line in retrieval. what can be done please.
customer_reviews.author: martin hernandez

customer_reviews.title: For all fishermen, DO NOT BUY PISCIFUN.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a Chaos 50 & had nothing but issues with it. Finally the casting mechanism broke & I sent it back to be fixed. I wanted a replacement & Piscifun said no way. They lost the reel that I’d sent back & only offered me a discount on purchasing another reel. Yes you read that correctly, THEY LOST THE REEL.... Piscifun products are very cheap, & with that, you pay for what you get. I would strongly recommend that anyone thinking of trying Piscifun not do so & spend their money on a tried & tasted company. It’s been over three months with no resolution other than to offer me a discount on products I have ZERO trust in..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: sticks and will not release
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could send this one back....I was casting the other day,,first time on the water this year. Grabbed the NEW real and cast it,,went well, then the second cast it stuck..I had to pull the line to unstick or release the line so I could cast it....thought maybe it was because it was BRAND-NEW so I kept trying....every other cast or so it would lock-up and not cast,,about hit my partner in the front of the boat. Had to put it down. NOT GOOD
customer_reviews.author: David F.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Went fishing in guam and it worked fine. But i did have a problem where the bail did not want to come up, so i had to thumb it up. I heard this was a problem with the reel. Was in salt water on the beach. After the trip i came home and broke the reel down and cleaned it up and greased it up. Not that bad on the corrision. But had to clean all the posts up. Seemed like they would get rusty if i left them. Other wise fishes well cast pretty good. And for the price i cannot complain.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Kim

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this reel after reading several reviews. overall i am impressed with the construction. It seems pretty solid. I went cat fishing to try it out. The casting was smooth and i really could get it out there (150ydd) from the bank with little effort. I have only landed one 5lbs blue cat on it, the retrieval was smooth.I love the power handle. Bait clicker works great. Hopefully i will beable to add more to this review in the coming weeks when i land a fish that will put this reel through its paces.
customer_reviews.author: SHILL

customer_reviews.title: Spool release stopped working after 3 uses
customer_reviews.text: I just returned from a camping/fishing trip. On my 1st day fishing using this reel (3rd time using it since I've bought it), the spool release stopped working. It won't automatically pop up. I have to manually pop it up myself to reel in. I only had my 5 year old penn jigmaster to trust for the whole trip. My 1 yr warranty ended couple a days ago (when I was on the trip).
customer_reviews.author: J & R Diaz

customer_reviews.title: well made reel and a good looker
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent maid line real and it looks good to boot it can be used in freshwater or salt it'll work for bass all the way to Steelhead it'll handle reef fish all the way up to Cobia this is an excellent middle-of-the-road real I would put it on anything from 1 to 2 lbs. fish all the way up to 50 lbs. fish it holds plenty of line for fighting I am very very pleased with it
customer_reviews.author: Paul labounty

customer_reviews.title: Smooth
customer_reviews.text: I have had a chance to use the Chaos several times now, and it is a smooth casting as my Shimano Cardiff, a reel costing several times as much. I especially love the much louder bait clicker on it, versus the much quieter one on the Cardiff. It is smoother casting than my Bass Pro CatMaxx bait caster. If I expand the number of Bait Cast rods for Catfish, I will be seriously looking at getting more Chaos reels for them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Drag sticks and locked up
customer_reviews.text: Update: Was able to contact CS and they are replacing it with a new one. Let’s hope this one last awhile Had a huge fish on then the drag started to stick and lock up. Ended up losing the fishing. Now the reel is broken.
customer_reviews.author: Xiao h Zhou

customer_reviews.title: Excellent reel!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent reel, great for casting long distance, excellent gear ratio, it has an excellent drag, have caught some nice big fish with it, so far it has not disappointed, I did put 20lb test mono line, it has worked flawlessly... Liked it so much I purchased 2 more, and thinking of purchasing another one!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Poncho

customer_reviews.title: POOR QUALITY BAD CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: Reel seemes like a good quality reel out of the box. Fished with the reel a few times this summer without issue. In the 4th or 5th trip my spool wouldnt engage when i would reel after casting. It woukd just make a grinding noise. I contacted customer service and theybhad me ship the reel in for repair. Now they claim that they cant fix the reel and want me to purchase a new reel for the same price I bought the reel for..... so frustrating. I guess ill spend the money on abu garcia from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Matt B.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this reel because of the good reviews. Unfortunately, the quality of this reel was not what I expected. The grip handle feels very cheap and the line clicker got stuck often. For the price, I rather buy the catmaxx 3000 for slightly more. Ideal for a beginner fishermen, but if you're experienced, looking for quality, this is not it!
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The reel is worth every penny. It's solid, smooth and does not backlash. I like a few features; the reel foot with four(4) rivets, the handle knob is smooth with a bearing, the gear stack is on a stem and not attached with a "c" clip. The reel has a thumb bar release and I like this feature. It has standard 5.3:1 gears and it holds about 300 yrds of 50# braid. The box claims it has 20 lb of drag. What I really like is that the bearings are in the side plate, old school style. And, and, there is a bearing over the A/R in the boss.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Z

customer_reviews.title: Awesome reel
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 40 for catfish but recently took it for saltwater. This reel was awesome. I usually take multiple reels on a trip. This was the only reel I used all day. I didn't mind having to re tie hooks, rigs, lures etc. The reel was flawless. Very happy with it. Performed just as well if not better than the other more expensive reels I have. Can't wait to purchase the 50 or 60 series and try one of the piscifun rods. Great product at a even greater price. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First Piscifun I have purchased
customer_reviews.text: It appears to be smooth and strong...I really like the color and the feel of the reel. I like the fighting handle for sure. We shall see how it holds up over a trophy blue catfish out in the James river Virginia...Keep up with me at Youtube Fishing with mike chavez for the upcoming review...
customer_reviews.author: Michael A Chavez

customer_reviews.title: No good! Won't handle a fish!
customer_reviews.text: This reel will not be part of my arsenal any more. It would not reel in a 30 pound catfish. The reel simply wouldn't crank with the fish on it. I had to hand wind it. One trip to the TN river was enough for me to know this was not a quality product. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Woods

customer_reviews.title: Bang for the Buck!
customer_reviews.text: I've used several vintage conventional Penn reels(no braking) for surf lazy bottom fishing. With the chaos 60 i can cast farther with less effort (only used it with 4 centrifugal pins on) barely working thumb. Today was windy hitting at 25mph used a 4oz sinker, casted around 30 times(around 70m), had only 1 backlash cause i wasn't watching when it hit the water.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin McClain

customer_reviews.title: the reel is great. one change would make it better
customer_reviews.text: the reel is great. one change would make it better .make brake block holder out of metal instead of plastic
customer_reviews.author: Larry Myer

customer_reviews.title: Broke first use - *Piscifun has replaced with a reinforced reel
customer_reviews.text: Low quality. Lots of play in the movement. Knob on the crank broke off first flathead I landed because it is made of plastic.. I have purchased many Piscifun reels and they are usually so good but I was not impressed with the Chaos. EDIT: Piscifun contacted me and they have sent me a brand new reel AND a new handle for the broken reel. The new handles are supposed to be reinforced so that they do now break as easily. I will je testing it soon. A+ for customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of theses both reels failed the first time used never even had a fish on them they failed at the line pick up as you turn the handle and yes the drag was set properly also the drag was rough on both reels.. MY opinion try are junk don't buy Feeling ducked buy manufacturing process Overall shifty product...
customer_reviews.author: william a.

customer_reviews.title: I’m Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Took it out today just for casting purposes, plan on using it for catfish. So far..... I’m impressed, Quiet and Smooth, and casted great on a stiff 7’ Berkeley Glowstick. Quite the distance actually, I was shocked. Well know better when “Fish On”
customer_reviews.author: Randy Walker

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Reel! Love the Clicker!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome round casting reel!! Love the clicker on it! Very good quality reel at a price you can’t beat! Sits on the rod nice, and very balanced (even with power handle)!
customer_reviews.author: Colin G

customer_reviews.title: Awesome reel especially for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Love the reel! Seems like an excellent reel for a great price. All the reviews I read and watched about this reel said it was comparable to a reel two or three times the price and I would agree. The only problem I had was that the Chaos 5000 and 6000 were sold out on the website so I was pretty excited to find them on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Edward J Lopez

customer_reviews.title: So/so
customer_reviews.text: Reel is well built and looks really sharp but it broke my first time out with it. I had to hold the line with my hand and hand over hand the line in order to retrieve it
customer_reviews.author: Michael F.

customer_reviews.title: Nice reel.
customer_reviews.text: This reel is great. Coastal Georgia redfish are no match for this reel. I have caught several 30 inch plus redfish with this reel with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great reel for the price!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, cast real good, great balance and it's build strong for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jose L. Colmenares

customer_reviews.title: The reel looks to be of good quality. The only problem I had was with ...
customer_reviews.text: The reel looks to be of good quality. The only problem I had was with the the eva knob. It fell off when I was loading the reel with line. I glued it back in place with epoxy glue. The inner bushing thread broke off from the plastic bushing. Hopefully piscifun will solve the problem with an aluminum know bushing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is prefect for all around fishing. And yes even for trout ( use the bait clicker).
customer_reviews.author: UFOGerber

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a left hand but recieved a right handed reel, the reel is ok for the money, nothing special here
customer_reviews.author: Kee Vang

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Incredible Value! I was an Abu Garcia guy, until their warrenty support went out the window...I will definitely be buying more reels from Picsifun. Highly Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mikski

customer_reviews.title: Very nice reel once again from Piscifun
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 40# size the reel is smooth and well made as others have stated, I paired it with an 7ft UglyStik and plan on using it for Cat Fish and Muskies and Northern Pike.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Weldon

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but OK quality
customer_reviews.text: good reel but not for long term usage. Only lasted these past 6months on Texas gulf coast . Caught a countless number of good size bull sharks on it 3-5ft. Now drag doesn't work. Have to manually lock back release after casting. Reeling has more friction than when first bought even with regular cleaning and oiling. Get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar J. Urbina

customer_reviews.title: Backlashes
customer_reviews.text: I like the color but that’s it. Back lashes all the time and have it set as tight as it goes. Hopefully I can return it.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Good striper or catfish reel!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this reel for stripers. Bait fishing. Very smooth reel as they all are when they are new. Clicker is loud enough and works well. Very surprised for the price. I will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Lara

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t compare to the high quality expensive reels
customer_reviews.text: It’s cheap but works ok I’m not worried about it like I would be over an expensive
customer_reviews.author: Blue

customer_reviews.title: Customer Support!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! The staff is awesome and personally messages you if there is anything you should know such as a recall and replacement on a part. Will order again soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Piscifun
customer_reviews.text: Reel did not hold up one fishing trip. Bearings busted in the reel and now the spool is locked down where I can’t even get my braided line off .. Very disappointed !
customer_reviews.author: SarahAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the smoothest reeling and casting baitcasting ...
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the smoothest reeling and casting baitcasting reels I have ever owned. I will definitely be using this reel a lot for catfishing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: smooth
customer_reviews.text: BEEN FISHING TAMPA BAY FOR SNAPPER AND GROUPER AND THIS REEL LOCKS AND LOADS ON THE SET. VERY SMOOTH RETRIEVE. I'M VERY PLEASED .WITH MY PURCHASE
customer_reviews.author: david m

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be a solid reel, can't wait to ...
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be a solid reel, can't wait to use it fishing for sturgeon and see how it handles them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it, usually use Ambassadors c4s but didn’t wanna spend the money so I opted for this, so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: joseph

customer_reviews.title: Very nice reel
customer_reviews.text: Great swimbait reel . The I have it on is good all around rod. Very easy to dail in when changing baits
customer_reviews.author: kenyatta spruill

customer_reviews.title: Read directions on centering spool
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping..Reels look pretty good...spooled them up and they cast well..can't wait to test on big cats
customer_reviews.author: Horns and whiskerfish

customer_reviews.title: This was an easy purchase. Description was spot on and product looks ...
customer_reviews.text: This was an easy purchase. Description was spot on and product looks and feels great. Have not fished with it yet, but practiced long casting, and it works great. Give Piscifun a shot.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Holds at least 230 yrds. of 30# Piscifun braid. And a very smooth drag.
customer_reviews.text: Solid as a rock like all Piscifun products! A little smaller than I thought same size as a 5000 ABU but built much better.
customer_reviews.author: james alan scarberry

customer_reviews.title: Cheap for a reason.
customer_reviews.text: The free spool broke with first 5lb striper. Horrible drag.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Lost money on this reel
customer_reviews.text: Had to throw it away the first day I used it. The reel a locked up gears busted it is not a good real
customer_reviews.author: Aarron hagan

customer_reviews.title: hands down best reel on the market right now .
customer_reviews.text: well made reels . made just as good if not better than the abu Garcia
customer_reviews.author: Lizz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent reels
customer_reviews.text: Really like the chaos 40 reels own 4 of them
customer_reviews.author: james griswold

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A very nice reel and is very smooth.this is a reel to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Fannin

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding heavy duty yet light round reel!
customer_reviews.text: I recently had the pleasure of purchasing a Piscifun Chaos 40. This particular size of the three available suits me best because the Chaos 50 and 60 are simply too large and powerful for my needs. In years past, I've been a devoted Abu Garcia round reel enthusiast. I couldn't pass up the chance to check out this new offering from Piscifun. Boy was I glad I did! This reel is simply amazing and will go toe to toe with the Abu Garcia 5600 C4 all day long and at half the price. I completed a detailed video review in a two part series you can find on YouTube
customer_reviews.author: Robert Maddox

customer_reviews.title: for throwing big heavy baits/rigs this a great reel.
customer_reviews.text: its smooth and casts well and lots of drag! for throwing big heavy baits/rigs this a great reel.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Already took it fishing! Caught a giant sting ray and a tuna! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Smstgermain

customer_reviews.title: great reel great price !
customer_reviews.text: i own a bait and tackle shop and wish i could carry them myself. great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: billy blackburn

customer_reviews.title: Exceptionally nice reel
customer_reviews.text: Really nice for the price. Cast really well and looks exceptional.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It casts amazing. I own 15 made in Sweden abuse and ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought the 40 size. Same size as an Abu 5000. Took reel apartment and was very impressed with the build quality. It casts amazing. I own 15 made in Sweden abus and I like this reel just as much. This makes my fifth piscifun reel. I have exclusively been using them over my abus and Penn's and haven't had a problem yet. Overall would definitely recommend. Great service as well, thanks Cathy:)
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had an opportunity to use this reel yet but fit and finish are very good.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Musky
customer_reviews.text: Great reel can handle throwing big bulldawgs and right speed for bucktails
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered for my hub. He is in love with this reel.
customer_reviews.author: Epifania Taveras

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It castes nice and and smooth reels really nice
customer_reviews.author: Bryce

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely awesome reel for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awesome reel for the buck! I fish a lot of Musky here in Wisconsin and this reel holds up to the test! I’ve been Musky fishing for 10 years and I’ve never seen a reel of this quality anywhere near the price point 5 stars!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Monster Madness Outdoors

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, works great and a good value.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, compact, solid, lightweight and smooth. This little gem with a 7 foot med action rod is what I use to cast jigs and lures. Casts far and smooth. I haven't caught a fish yet but had lots of fun using this great little reel. I know you havent heard of the brand but they make decent stuff and inexpensive. I have 2 spinning reels from Piscifun that I like very much. I recommend this reel and brand.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Poor service.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the reel ,spooled it up with line and the drag would not tighten up. I contacted the piscifun web site and am still waiting on a reply .
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Cassida

customer_reviews.title: Impressive built quality for price paid
customer_reviews.text: Quite surprised to receive it on time. Built quality is impressive for the price paid. Yet to try it though. But the reel feels smooth. Definitely a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Husain Dawoed

customer_reviews.title: Terrible reel
customer_reviews.text: The reel drag bearing has already went out in the month of me having it. Would not recommend to anyone that catches fish over 5lbs
customer_reviews.author: Justin weirich

customer_reviews.title: Terrible reel. Bought it for float fishing for steelhead
customer_reviews.text: Terrible reel. Bought it for float fishing for steelhead. Used it once and the bearings were terrible. Would never waste a dollar on it. Sorry I spent money on it.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy B.

product_meta.title: Piscifun Chaos Round Baitcasting Reel Reinforced Metal Body Baitcaster Conventional Saltwater Fishing Reels
feature_bullets: Professional - The Chaos round baitcasting reel features anti line skip caved CNC aluminum spool helps you spool the fishing line easier and more effortless
Powerful - Supreme carbon fiber drag system paired with oversized CNC cut main gear provides up to 20LB drag power
Unique - The precision click tension knob provides accurate tiny adjustment of the spool tension
Versatile - Piscifun Chaos conventional baitcasting fishing reel is perfect for cat fishing, surf fishing, other fishing techniques in freshwater and saltwater
Performance - Extended aluminum crank handle and fatigue reducing oversized nonslip EVA knobs increase leverage and thus power

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
